lead_paragraph: Nathalie Kosciusko-Morizet, a former campaign spokeswoman of ex-French president Nicolas Sarkozy, on Tuesday joined an already crowded race for the center-right's presidential nomination in a primary due in November.

headline.main: Former Sarkozy Protegee Launches Bid for French Presidential Primaries
headline.print_headline: Former Sarkozy Protegee Launches Bid for French Presidential Primaries

snippet: Nathalie Kosciusko-Morizet, a former campaign spokeswoman of ex-French president Nicolas Sarkozy, on Tuesday joined an already crowded race for the center-right's presidential nomination in a primary due in November.
